chunk:
Esther & Mila Radiant Smoothing Sleep Mask

Brand: Esther & Mila

Category: Mask

Ingredients: distilled water, shea butter, illipe butter, ethylhexyl olivate, squalane, glyceryl stearate citrate, glycerin (plant-based), vitamin E, xanthan gum, caprylyl glycol, and phenoxyethanol.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
